post:
[**EdgeServ.com**](https://edgeserv.com/) is having a special another out of this world special for the month of August. Receive 30% off our best-selling packages.
The discounted pricing will be reflected on the payment page.

-----

cPanel - Blast Package - 1GB Storage for $1.19/month



* 1 GB Storage Space
* 10 GB Bandwidth
* 1 Domain only (no addon domains)
* Instant Setup
* 24/7/365 Quality Support
Locations: Amsterdam, Atlanta, Montreal

[**Order Here!**](https://edgeserv.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=357&promocode=fire40)

-----

* 10GB Storage
* 100 GB Bandwidth

* Instant Setup
* 24/7/365 Quality Support

Locations: Amsterdam, Atlanta, Montreal



[**Order Here!**](https://edgeserv.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&promocode=fire40)
